channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2023061128
item.description:
Report X-2023061128

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-17T15:10:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-13
  • City: POCATELLO
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Trailer was being unloaded when package handlers noticed box was wet and informed QA of leaking pkg. QA responded by removing pkg from trailer, transferring pkg into HazMat tote for further handling. DescribePack: Bottle lid seemed to have loosened enough to cause liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Once pkg was noticed to be leaking package handlers notified QA to come and contain leaking pkg from trailer.
